Function reference

All functions

analyzeAnnoTALE()
Runs the "predict" and "analyze" steps of AnnoTALE on a fasta file.
annout-class annout
annotale output
buildAnnoTALE()
Run the "build" stage of AnnoTALE.
buildDisTalGroups()
Run Alvaro's Perl scripts for TALEs grouping
buildRepeatMsa()
Perform multiple alignment of TALE repeat or RVD sequences
convertRepeat2ClusterIDAlign()
Convert repeat alignment to clusterID alignment
convertRepeat2RvdAlign()
Substitute Distal repeat IDs for RVDs in a TALE alignment matrix.
correcTales()
Correct TALE ORFs in error-prone sequences
diagnoseTaleParts()
Report on potential 'pseudo TALEs' in a taleParts object
distalr()
Emulate DisTal in R
getRepeat2RvdMapping()
Generate a mapping between Distal repeat IDs and their cognate RVD.
getRepeat2RvdMappingFromDistalr()
Generate a mapping between Distal repeat IDs and their cognate RVD.
getTaleParts()
Fetch Annotale parts from a tellTale output directory.
groupTales()
Grouping TALEs
heatmap_msa()
Plotting of multiple alinged Tal sequences
heatmap_talomes()
Heatmap plotting of rvd sequence variants
plotTaleComposition()
Visualize TALE content in a taleParts object
plotTaleTargetPred()
Plot TALE RVD sequences along a potential DNA target region
preditale()
Run TALE target predictions on DNA sequence(s) using PrediTale.
read_distal_aligns()
read alignment results of Alvaro's Perl scripts for building TALE groups from DisTal output
runDistal()
Run the Distal tool
taleParts2RvdStringSet()
Generates a RVD sequences set from a taleParts object
talvez()
Run TALE target predictions on DNA sequence(s) using Talvez
tantale
tantale: Transcription Activator-Like Effectors (TALEs) tools
tellTale()
Search and report on the features of TALE protein domains potentially encoded in subject DNA sequences
tellTale2()
This function name is deprecated and will ultimately be removed. It corresponds to the tellTale which should be used instead.
tellTaleLegacy()
Search and report on the features of TALE protein domains potentially encoded in subject DNA sequences
toListOfSplitedStr()
Split strings of TALE sequences (`sep`-separated rvd or distal repeat IDs)
